title: Stores: Managing the Inventory of a Store
body:
Stores: Managing the Inventory of a Store¶

Inventory keeps track of how much stock there is left of each product in a store.
To manage the inventory of a store, you will need to have navigated to the store. Refer here if you are having trouble reaching this point.

  1. Click Inventory

  2. View, per product, the number of items that are:

    • In stock: these items are in the warehouse

    • Reserved: these items are currently in someone’s cart

    • Unfulfilled: these items have been ordered but not yet fulfilled

    • On hand: these items are available for sale

  3. Click and Update Inventory to change the number of items in stock

    • Click

    • Enter a new number

    • Repeat for each change needed

    • Click Save
